header.address: Kyiv region, Brovary district, Rusaniv village, 39 a Zhovtneva str.

metadata.title: Krupomol
metadata.desc: Ukrainian Agricultural Transport Group LLC has been specializing in the production of high-quality cereals for the Ukrainian and international markets for over 10 years. Own production, control at all stages and compliance with international standards allow us to ensure stable product quality that meets the requirements of the modern market.

hero.title: Reliability and quality in every grain

certification.title: Certification
certification.text: Our products comply with international food quality and safety standards, which is confirmed by ISO 22000 and ISO 9001 certificates. Control at all stages of production guarantees stable quality and compliance with the requirements of the world market.

about.title: Who are we?
about.text: Ukrainian Agricultural Transport Group LLC has been specializing in the production of high-quality cereals for the Ukrainian and international markets for over 10 years. Own production, control at all stages and compliance with international standards allow us to ensure stable product quality that meets the requirements of the modern market.

metadata.title: Products | Krupomol
metadata.desc: Wholesale supplies of natural cereals of the highest quality from a certified manufacturer

hero.title: Natural cereals of the highest quality

offer.title: What do we offer our customers?
offer.text: Ukrainian Agricultural Transport Group LLC is a manufacturing company specializing in the production of high-quality cereals. We offer products that meet international standards, providing stable supplies for wholesale buyers and exports. Flexible terms of cooperation, as well as the possibility of payment both in cash and non-cash, make our products available to various categories of customers.

metadata.title: Purchase prices | Krupomol
metadata.desc: LLC "Ukrainian Agricultural Transport Group" offers favorable terms of cooperation for suppliers of grains and cereals. To clarify the current purchase prices and terms of cooperation, please contact us.

cooperation.title: We offer favorable terms of cooperation for suppliers of grains and cereals.
cooperation.info: To clarify the current purchase prices and terms of cooperation, please contact us at the contacts listed or leave a request via the feedback form.

payment.title: Delivery and payment

list: Calculation of the cost of delivery: 0.1 UAH for each kilogram of products for every 100 km of the route

payment.info: To clarify the details of payment and delivery, please contact us at the specified contacts.

metadata.title: Certification | Krupomol
metadata.desc: Ukrainian Agricultural Transport Group LLC adheres to the highest standards of product quality and safety. All our products are carefully controlled at every stage of production - from raw material selection to packaging and storage.

hero.title: Product certification
hero.desc: Ukrainian Agricultural Transport Group LLC adheres to the highest standards of product quality and safety. All our products are carefully controlled at every stage of production - from the selection of raw materials to packaging and storage.

list.title: ISO 22000 – Food Safety Management System
list.desc: The certificate certifies compliance with the ISO 22000 standard - Food Safety Management System

list.title: ISO 9001 – Quality management system
list.desc: The certificate certifies compliance with the standard ISO 22000 - Food Safety Management System.

list.title: ISO 9001 – Quality management system
list.desc: The certificate certifies compliance with the standard ISO 22000 - Food Safety Management System.

list.title: High level of product quality
list.desc: Certification confirms that our products are manufactured in compliance with strict requirements for raw materials, technological process and final product. We carry out multi-level quality control, including laboratory tests and verification of compliance with all established standards.

list.title: Compliance with international standards
list.desc: Our ISO and HACCP certificates confirm that our products and production processes meet international food safety requirements. This allows us to supply products to the markets of Europe, Asia and other regions with high quality standards.

list.title: Consumers safety
list.desc: We guarantee that our products do not contain harmful impurities, meet environmental standards and retain all their beneficial properties. Thanks to the implementation of the HACCP system, we identify and minimize risks at every stage of production.

list.title: Possibility of export to EU countries and other regions
list.desc: Certified products comply with the legal requirements of international markets, which opens up wide opportunities for export. This allows us to work with European, Asian and other foreign partners, providing them with high-quality products.

certification.info: Thanks to these guarantees, our customers can be confident in the quality, safety and reliability of the products they receive.
